${modID}:ChemisterJournal.NAME: Chemister's Journal
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, reduce the cost of a random card in your hand by 1 for the turn.

#yBlock.

DESCRIPTIONS: When #y${modID}:Infused, gain #b
#yVigor.

DESCRIPTIONS: When #y${modID}:Infused, draw #b

cards.

${modID}:FlaskAer.NAME: Flask of Aer
DESCRIPTIONS: When #y${modID}:Infused, reduce the cost of the next card drawn by #b
for the turn.

${modID}:ExemplaryEnzyme.NAME: Exemplary Enzyme
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time each combat you draw a #y${modID}:Catalyst, randomly #y${modID}:Infuse one of its corresponding Flasks.

${modID}:DoubleDipper.NAME: Double Dipper
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you #y${modID}:Infuse each turn, #y${modID}:Infuse the same Flask again.

${modID}:TravelRefill.NAME: Travel Refill
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of every 4th combat, obtain a random temporary #y${modID}:Reagent.

${modID}:RunawayReaction.NAME: Runaway Reaction
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #y${modID}:Infuse, deal #b%d damage to a random enemy.

${modID}:FragileFlasks.NAME: Fragile Flasks
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you take unblocked attack damage, #y${modID}:Infuse a random Flask.

${modID}:EternalFlame.NAME: Eternal Flame
DESCRIPTIONS: #yVigor consumption is halved.

${modID}:CatalystCatalyst.NAME: Catalyst Catalyst
DESCRIPTIONS: The cost of #y${modID}:Catalyst cards is reduced by #b%d more when you #y${modID}:Infuse.

${modID}:VolatileMix.NAME: Volatile Mix
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose two Flasks. Whenever you #y${modID}:Infuse one, #y${modID}:Infuse the other.

${modID}:ChemisterGuide.NAME: Chemister'sGuide
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose and add #b%d #y${modID}:Reagents to your deck.

${modID}:PerfectedElixir.NAME: Perfected Elixir
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time each turn you #y${modID}:Infuse all your Flasks, gain [E].
